thread.title: NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING The Curry County Soil & Water
thread.title_full: NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING The Curry County Soil & Water

title: NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING The Curry County Soil & Water
text:
NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING The Curry County Soil & Water ad date: 10/17/2015 
NOTICE OF PUBLIC MEETING The Curry County Soil & Water Conservation District will hold a finance work session at 5:30 p.m. on Tuesday, October 27. The Districts regular monthly meeting will follow at 7:00 p.m. Agenda topics for the regular meeting include approving a public meetings policy, discussing a grant admn policy, appointing a contract review committee, revising payment windows for future contracts, identifying outstanding agreements with other organizations, financing of the Sullivan CREP installation, and volunteer liability. Other matters may be discussed. Both meetings will be held at the Curry Watersheds Partnership office located at 29692 Ellensburg Ave., Gold Beach. Interested parties are welcome to attend. The meeting location is accessible to persons with disabilities. A request for an interpreter for the hearing impaired or for other accommodations for persons with disabilities should be made to Liesl Coleman at least 48 hours prior to the meeting: (541) 247-2755 ext 0#. Publish October 17, 2015
